department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Bowl, small, deep, flaring; cream-colored earthenware painted in grey-blues and brown, with pale gold lustre. Design consists of winged lion iwth human head. Insides rim consists of band of circles. Outside of freely executed Cufic characters in brown. High foot, the inside of which show bits of earhtenware still attached. Broken and mended. Break on inside rim shows through to earthenware.
medium: Earthenware with underglaze painted decor, Sultanabad ware
title: Bowl
